name: 張嘉銘
objective:
布林代數與邏輯閘，組合邏輯，算術演算邏輯，同步循序邏
輯，演繹狀態機，非同步循序邏輯。
schedule:
週次：單元主題
一：Digital systems, Binary Numbers, Number-base conversions,
二：Complements, Signed number, Binary codes, Storage, Boolean algebra, Binary logic.
三：Boolean function, Canonical and standard forms, Digital logic gates, IC.
四：Map method, Four-variable map, Five-variable map.
五：小考、POS Simplification.
六：Don't Care conditions, NAND and NOR, Exclusive-OR, Combinational circuits.
七：Analysis, Design, Binary adder-subtractor, Decimal adder, Binary multiplier.
八：Comaprator, Decoders, Encoders, Multiplexers, Sequential circuits, Latch, Flip-flops.
九：期中考試
十：Analysis of clocked sequential circuits.
十一：Synthesis of sequential circuits.
十二：State reduction and assignment.
十三：Design procedure.
十四：小考、Registers, Shift registers.
十五：Ripple counters, Synchronous counters, Other counters.
十六：Memory and programmable logic.
十七：Asynchronous sequential logic.
十八：期末考試
materials: 教科書：Mano and Ciletti, ”Digital Design”, Pearson Prentice Hall, 2007.
